about_content:
This is a tool based on Strictura and make improvement.
It's open soucre under MIT License and images made by it(not vanilla) are under CC BY 4.0(https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Open source address: https://github.com/MioMiko/StructuraImproved
Orignal Structura address: https://github.com/RavinMaddHatter/Structura
